text: 19.20 Ais 30.33, Dan 7.11, Lep 13.1-18, 14.10, 16.13-14, 20.10, 20.15 Anɨgɨlak ak pen, bɨ chag hos kayɨg adek besɨg yek ak, ne tap ladek ak sek, bɨne nop gos ñek binɨb okok kɨlop yepɨs yɨbɨl agñak ak sek, kɨlopmɨŋal dɨ nag lɨl, mab mɨŋɨlaŋ salpa sek ke yɨneb mɨgan ak dɨyokak. Tap ladek bɨne anɨb ak, ned ne tap mageptek gɨl binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl kɨlop yepɨs gek, tap ladek kɨjɨkɨl ne ak dɨl, kawnan nop tek nɨŋɨd gɨlɨlak ak agnɨgɨlak.
